did.abstract: Publications of the Michigan Union includes miscellaneous annual reports, brochures, constitutions, directories, histories, manuals, newsletters, organizational charts, programs, regulations, reprints, schedules of the Michigan Union; as well as musical scores and programs from the Michigan Union Opera, Mimes, and Musket productions.

repository.corpname: Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

acqinfo.p: The publications are received periodically from the unit (Donor # 2024).

accessrestrict.p: The publications are open to research.

userestrict.p: Copyright is held by the Regents of the University of Michigan.

prefercite.p: [item], folder, box, Michigan Union Publications, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

bioghist.p: See the history in the finding aid for Michigan Union records.

scopecontent.p: Publications of the Michigan Union includes miscellaneous annual reports, brochures, constitutions, directories, histories, manuals, newsletters, organizational charts, programs, regulations, reprints, schedules of the Michigan Union; as well as musical scores and programs from the Michigan Union Opera, Mimes, and Musket productions. The Publications series is divided into two subseries: Unit Publications and Sub-Unit Publications

controlaccess.head: Subjects:
controlaccess.corpname: University of Michigan--Students--Social life and customs.
controlaccess.title: M handbook.
Michiganetiquette.

scopecontent.p: The Unit Publications subseries includes newsletters, directories, and manuals relating to the building of and the daily activities of the Michigan Union.

unittitle.title: A Brief Story of the Michigan Union

did.unittitle: The Michigan Union for Michigan Men, undated
The Plan and Purpose of the Michigan Union, circa 1905
University of Michigan Union: for University Men Everywhere, circa 1915
Subscribers to the Building Fund of the University of Michigan Union, 1916
Unfinished Business--The Michigan Union Building: List of Alumni Who Have Subscribed Nothing, 1919
Unfinished Business--The Michigan Union Building: List of Subscribing Alumni by Classes, 1919
Story Without End: The History of the University of Michigan Union, 1903-1954, 1954
Michigan Union Bulletin: Issued Only to Chairmen and Members of Michigan Union Committees, 1915
Organization Plan: University of Michigan Union, 1917-1918
Michigan Union-North Campus Commons Organizational Assessment, undated
University of Michigan Union, Ann Arbor, 1921

scopecontent.p: The Sub-Unit Publications subseries includes printed material from sub-units within the Michigan Union, such as MUSKET (Michigan Union Show, Ko-Eds Too), Project Community, and the Ticket Office. In addition, there is a complete collection of musical scores and programs from the productions of MUSKET's predecessor, the Michigan Union Opera, or MIMES.

Let's Go Over Here Over There, 1918
